Pre-Game Insights: Brooklyn faces Boston in Eastern Conference action Friday.Boston went 64-18 overall, 41-11 in Eastern Conference games, and 37-4 at home last season.Brooklyn finished 32-50 overall, 5-11 in Atlantic Division games, and 12-29 on the road last season.The Celtics averaged 120.6 points per game, 16.3 from the free-throw line, and 49.5 from deep last season.The Nets averaged 110.4 points per game while shooting 45.6% from the field and 36.2% from 3-point range last season.Kristaps Porzingis is out for the Celtics due to a foot injury, and Jaylen Brown is out for the Celtics due to a hip injury.Bojan Bogdanovic, Ben Simmons, Noah Clowney, Day'Ron Sharpe, and Trendon Watford are day-to-day for the Nets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article provides historical context of the teams' performances last season.The game is at the TD Garden in Boston.The game is on Friday, November 8, 2024, at 7:30 p.m. EST.
